overview: Remember when you were growing up, there were all these things that you were told 'NEVER' to do...You know, 'Never talk to strangers'...'Never cross the street without looking both ways'...'Never mix business with pleasure'...Some you just accepted as fact, some you questioned as you got older...and others you knew were bullshit right from the start.In 'Never Say Never', Kaylani puts these old parental advisories to the test, like only Kaylani can. She examines the good and the bad of not following the rules. She decides to take on some of these old school rules, and with hilarious results. She quickly learns why sometimes it's just no fun to say 'Never'.
title: Never Say Never
